Talk_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>We've got to put an end to this so the
troops can get some rest. I just wish
I could join the fight.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The captain is offering to buy a fancy meal
for whoever kills the most monsters!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:WorkHeavy>If you're here to lend us a hand, Link, I'm
sure it'll help improve the squad's morale.

Please, give those ghastly monsters what
they have coming!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're right in the middle of a monster-
control mission.<sp:5:1:0> Hold on...<sp:5:0:0> Link?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Link, it's you!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Do you remember me?<sp:5:0:0> It's Toren! We met
at Hyrule Castle. We were looking for
Princess Zelda.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Does this mean you came to help us?!
PosterMessage_Eldin:
Heading <clr:0000>to a cave <clr:ffff>near Lake Darman, a
dried lava lake to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>. Will root
out all monsters in and around the cave.
This is a warning to all—beware the lizard-
shaped lake! -Captain Toren, Monster-
Control Crew, Squad Two
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_00>By the way, Link, I couldn't help but
notice you don't seem to be carrying
that famed sword of yours.
I've heard you have a <clr:0000>special sword<clr:ffff>.
And yet, what you have on you now
doesn't seem so...special.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Ah, never mind...<sp:5:0:0> I should know better
than to judge things based on looks.
I'm sorry.
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I have to say, your moves were even more
impressive this time!

You've saved me time and time again.
I admit, I do feel a bit guilty about that.
<sp:5:0:0>Oh...hmm?
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Link! Don't tell me!<sp:0:4:0>That weapon of yours... Is that the
famous Master Sword?

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'd heard it was a special sword. <sp:5:0:0>Yes,
I see! The aura around it is really quite
different from other weapons.
Thank you for letting me lay eyes upon
something so precious.
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm ashamed to say this, but some of
our squad members have been hit by
a counterattack.
I've been desperate to find a way to get
help to them.

If I rush in there, I risk being taken out
and stranding them for good. But then...
what DO I do?!
There has to be some way to <clr:0000>defeat those
monsters<clr:ffff> so I can get to my squad.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_00>By the way, Link, I couldn't help but
notice you don't seem to be carrying
that famed sword of yours.
I'd heard you have the legendary <clr:0000>sword
that seals the darkness<clr:ffff>.

And yet, what you're carrying now
doesn't look like it would be considered,
eh...legendary.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Never mind me...<sp:5:0:0> I should know better
than to judge things based on looks.
I'm very sorry.
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>It's pretty dangerous up ahead. You don't
want to go anywhere near there if you're
not well prepared.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Look, if you've got time to flap your
gums, do us all a favor and take out a
monster or two!
Talk1051:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>You need something? If so, go talk to
the captain.
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>If you need something, talk to the
<clr:0000>captain<clr:ffff>. Or better yet, why don't you
help me fight these monsters!
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's that awful <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>. Monsters are
turning up all over the place because of it.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>The monster-control crew's mission here
is to move in and take out the monsters
up ahead.
After we <clr:0000>close in <clr:ffff>on their base, we'll
mount our <clr:0000>attack<clr:ffff>.

If you're up for it, Link, you should join
us. We have a better chance of driving
out those foul monsters together.
Talk1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Hmm... What are you doing here? You
know this place is crawling with monsters,
right? It's not safe.
Talk1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Those monsters don't stand a chance
against a force like ours!
Talk1018: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>We did it!<sp:5:1:0> That was the very last one!
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>After we <clr:0000>close in<clr:ffff> on the monsters' base,<sp:5:0:0>
we will <clr:0000>launch<clr:ffff> our attack.

If you'd like to join us, we'd certainly
welcome that.<sp:0:4:0>If we join forces, I'm sure we can drive
out those ghastly monsters!
Talk1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey,<sp:5:0:0> you're the new guy, aren't you?
The one that decided to join us?
Talk1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Well, it looks like the fighting is
already over.

There was supposed to be this horde of
monsters for us to fight inside this cave.
Talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Let's just get this over with and get a
proper meal out of the <clr:0000>captain<clr:ffff>.
Talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Here, allow me to give you this reward for
all you did.
Talk1056:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>No...it can't be.<sp:5:1:0> It can't be you again
can it, Link?
Talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Without your help, Link, I'm not sure
we would have been able to complete
our mission.
Well, we make for the <clr:0000>Akkala Span <clr:ffff>in
<clr:0000>northeast Akkala<clr:ffff> next.

We'll try to defeat as many monsters as
we can.<sp:0:4:0>Farewell for now. I hope we cross paths
again some day.
Talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?!<sp:5:1:0> You got rid of them all?!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't know how to thank you, Link.<sp:5:1:0>
I should have known that going to battle
alone wouldn't be a problem for you.
Talk1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Thank you for your help, Link. If you don't
mind, do you have a moment?
Talk1059:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Did someone beat us to taking out
the monsters?
Talk1001: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>What could you possibly need right now?
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>Right now, we're approaching a swarm of
monsters up ahead.

After we <clr:0000>close in <clr:ffff>on their base,<sp:5:0:0> we plan
to <clr:0000>begin our attack<clr:ffff>.

If you're up for it, Link, <sp:5:0:0>we could join
forces and give those hideous monsters
the boot together!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>You probably noticed that we're in the
midst of a monster strike.

I hate that I can't join the fight, but
someone has to stay behind as backup
in case the worst happens.
But if you gave them a hand, Link, I know
it would raise their morale.

Please, join the fight and help us drive
out those foul monsters!
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We are so fortunate that you came to our
aid, Link. I really can't thank you enough.

And you did the majority of the work
too—living up to your reputation, I see.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You did the hardest part of the work here.
I really can't thank you enough, Link.
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:1:3:4:6e000000>May the Goddess Hylia always protect
you, brave swordsman!
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Sorry, but I don't have time to chat.
You need something, go talk to
the <clr:0000>captain<clr:ffff>!
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Who knew you'd turn up at this cave to
help us again, Link?!<sp:5:0:0>

We cleaned the monsters out of here
before, <sp:5:0:0>but I guess the blood moon
brought them back.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Anyway, you not only helped us out,
you did most of the work. <sp:5:1:0>I don't know
how to thank you.
Talk1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>If you can chitchat at a time like this,
the least you could do is take down
one monster!
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Those monsters are about to get a deadly
dose of monster-control crew power!
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you don't mind my saying,<sp:5:0:0> that weapon
of yours is the famed Master Sword,
isn't it?
I'd heard it was a truly special weapon.<sp:5:0:0>
Incredible. Thank you for letting me lay
eyes upon something so precious.
Talk1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>It was you! <sp:5:0:0>I can't believe you did it again!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I hate to admit it, Link,<sp:5:0:0> but I'm starting to
wonder if we even deserve to be called a
monster-control crew.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Sparks are gonna fly when I start swinging
my sword.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>What is it? <sp:5:0:0>Can't you see we're busy
trying to exterminate a bunch of
resurrected monsters here...
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It was a tough battle. Now it's time
to rest, recover, and prepare for the
next fight.
Talk1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Is that Link over there?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Ah, it is you! <sp:5:1:0>I'm Toren. We met at
Hyrule Castle.<sp:0:4:0>I never expected you to back us up!<sp:5:1:0>
If you don't mind, could I have a minute
of your time?
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>We'll be heading <clr:0000>northeast <clr:ffff>to the
<clr:0000>Akkala Span in Akkala<clr:ffff> to deal with
things there.
No doubt the <clr:0000>blood moon <clr:ffff>is causing
problems.

Of course, if you joined us, Link,<sp:5:0:0> there
isn't anything we couldn't handle. But
I probably shouldn't say such things.
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Thank you for the help, Link. If you don't
mind, can I have a moment of your time?
Talk1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Is that Link over there?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>It is! <sp:5:0:0>Wow, it's such an honor to have you
fight beside us again!

If you don't mind, could I talk to you for
a minute?
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I have to say, Link, your skill with the
sword is even more impressive than
last time.
You've saved me time and time again.
I admit, I feel a bit guilty about that.
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! It's you, Link! I'm so sorry I was rude!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's just, thanks to that <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>,
monsters are showing up all over
the place.
But, Link, you have the strength of a
hundred fighters. Your arrival is sure
to help troop morale!
If we join forces, I'm certain we can get
rid of those repulsive monsters.
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>What is it? <sp:5:0:0>Can't you see we're trying to
exterminate a bunch of resurrected
monsters here...
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Awful, just awful... My orders didn't reach
the squad, and then the monsters hit
them with a devastating counterattack.
If I can just figure out a way <clr:0000>to beat the
monsters<clr:ffff>, I can get in there and help
the injured...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But...I don't know what to do.
Talk_022:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>At this hour, the monsters should be very
drowsy and very vulnerable. If only I could
join the fight...
Talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're right in the middle of a mission.
Could you...not distract the other
squad members?
Talk_023:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>The longer the fight drags on, the more
of a disadvantage we'll be at. I just wish
I could join the battle...
Talk_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>We've got to put an end to this before
nightfall. I just wish I could join the fight.
Talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! It's you, Link! I'm so sorry I was rude!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's just, thanks to that <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>,
monsters have been showing up all over
the place.
And while my squad fought bravely, they
took a terrible beating.

I'm trying to figure out a way to rescue
the injured, but I'm not sure how to do it.
